author: cnbc.com
title: Cal Nathan of IDEKO Productions & NYFF Events Divests from New York Tent
text:
BOHEMIA, N.Y., Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- New York Tent ( http://www.nytent.com ) has announced that Cal Nathan, a principal partner of IDEKO Productions and NYFF Events has divested from NY Tent, LLC and sold his interest to Kuzari Group a premier owner/operator of lower middle market businesses in the United States.
David Tannenbaum will remain the managing partner and CEO of New York Tent. Commenting on the transaction David said "We thank Cal for all of his contributions to NY Tent and wish him well."
About NY Tent: NY Tent is a full-service tent, temporary structure and event rental company serving the greater New York Metro area and the North East. Specializing in high end, custom and larger volume events, New York Tent has been operating since 1994 and has experienced exponential growth since 2013. By offering a wide range of products and services including tents, temporary structures, flooring, lighting, staging, HVAC, temporary power, rental furniture and more, New York Tent has secured the position of an industry leader. The key is to provide exceptional quality and personalized service from conception to completion, which the company is confident in doing with each and every event.
About Kuzari Group: Kuzari Group is a private investment and strategic development firm partnering to build businesses with flexible capital solutions across a variety of industries and situations. We are focused on investing in and developing small and unique businesses and projects which represent long-term value creation opportunities.
